results.summary: A teenager is arrested over the fatal stabbing of a college student in Birmingham.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/98879427-e16b-6949-8d55-1fed8a719c8d"><image id="69901296"/><paragraph role="introduction">A teenager has been arrested over the fatal stabbing of a college student in Birmingham.</paragraph><paragraph>West Midlands Police said a 17-year-old was held after attending Birmingham Central Police station at midday.</paragraph><paragraph>Azim Azam, 16,  from Billesley in Birmingham, was found collapsed in the street after getting off the number two bus in Moseley at 08:30 BST on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>His family paid tribute to him as a "bubbly character" with "a friendly nature."</paragraph><paragraph>In a statement, the family said: "Azim was a lovely young lad who was full of life. He was looking forward to going to college to embark on a new chapter of his life. </paragraph><paragraph>"We still can't get around the fact that someone can be so cruel and heartless enough to take a fellow human life. </paragraph><paragraph>"How can people go around thinking they are clever or big by carrying knives? We have lost a loved one." </paragraph><paragraph>West Midlands Police said it believed Azim became involved in a row with a fellow passenger on the bus.</paragraph><paragraph>He was found lying in Yardley Wood Road at its junction with Hayfield Road having suffered a stab wound. </paragraph><paragraph>He later died in hospital. </paragraph></body>
results.shortFormBody: <shortFormBody xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/98879427-e16b-6949-8d55-1fed8a719c8d"><paragraph>A teenager has been arrested over the fatal stabbing of a college student in Birmingham.</paragraph><paragraph>West Midlands Police said a 17-year-old was held after attending Birmingham Central Police station at midday.</paragraph><paragraph>Azim Azam, 16,  from Billesley in Birmingham, was found collapsed in the street after getting off the number two bus in Moseley at 08:30 BST on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>His family paid tribute to him as a "bubbly character" with "a friendly nature."</paragraph></shortFormBody>

69901296.caption: Azim Azam, 16, was described as a "lovely young lad, who was full of life"

69889729.caption: Azim Azam was found collapsed at the junction between Hayfield Road and Yardley Wood Road

items.summary: A 16-year-old boy dies after being found stabbed shortly after getting off a bus in Birmingham.
items.headline: Boy dies after being found stabbed at Moseley bus stop
items.shortHeadline: Boy found stabbed at bus stop dies
